name: Polygon Squad
description:
Evil Scribbles have taken over the geometric world. 

But don't worry Polygon Squad is here, when one of them dies another takes their place. Each member has a special ability you can use.

Try to erase as many scribbles as you can before the entire team has been taken control of by the scribbles.

Controls: 

WASD - Moving

Left Click - Shoot

Space - Use Ability

Esc - Pause
